languages.text: "Если Висирь велел так поступить — значит, на то была причина. Должно быть, Неумирающий открыл ему то, что неведомо нам".
"If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."
languages.original_text: "Если Висирь велел так поступить — значит, на то была причина. Должно быть, Неумирающий открыл ему то, что неведомо нам".

traits.locale_text: "If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."
"If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."
"If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."
"If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."
"If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."

languages.text: «Si el Visir lo ha ordenado, sus motivos tendrá. El Inmortal debe de haberle revelado algo que desconocemos».
languages.original_text: "If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."

traits.locale_text: «Si el Visir lo ha ordenado, sus motivos tendrá. El Inmortal debe de haberle revelado algo que desconocemos».

languages.text: 「ヴィジールが命じたのなら、何か理由があったに違いにありません。不死の者は、私たちが知らない何かを彼に明かしたのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィジールが命じたのなら、何か理由があったに違いにありません。不死の者は、私たちが知らない何かを彼に明かしたのでしょう」

languages.text: “既然这是宿老的命令，那一定事出有因。不死之神肯定是向他透露了某些我们不清楚的事情。”
languages.original_text: "If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."

traits.locale_text: “既然这是宿老的命令，那一定事出有因。不死之神肯定是向他透露了某些我们不清楚的事情。”

languages.text: "Wenn es der Wesir befohlen hat, muss es einen Grund dafür geben. Der Todlose muss ihm etwas offenbart haben, von dem wir nichts wissen."
languages.original_text: "If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn es der Wesir befohlen hat, muss es einen Grund dafür geben. Der Todlose muss ihm etwas offenbart haben, von dem wir nichts wissen."

languages.text: « Si le vizir l'a ordonné, il avait sûrement une bonne raison. L'Immortel a dû lui révéler quelque chose que nous ignorons. »
languages.original_text: "If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."

traits.locale_text: « Si le vizir l'a ordonné, il avait sûrement une bonne raison. L'Immortel a dû lui révéler quelque chose que nous ignorons. »

languages.text: "Bunu Vezir emrettiyse ardında mutlaka bir neden vardır. Ölmeyen, ona haberdar olmadığımız bir şeyler açıklamış olmalı."
languages.original_text: "If the Vizsier ordered it, there must have been a reason. The Undying One must have revealed something to him that we are ignorant of."
